Text:
No offense REQ-TV, if you're legit, but is this a possible hacked trusted account?

The last upload from this user was on 9-18-2009.
None taken, maybe one of the current downloaders can confirm once they're done.

Yeah, well, since you are actually commenting, you're not acting like the typical torrent spammer.

I guess you are who you are and not a hacked account.

Besides, you didn't suddenly upload 30 torrents, like the typical spammer.

It just seemed strange that you hadn't upped in 14 months.  I think you know what I mean.
